sentences: ADP 2-8 took place in February 2015, in Geneva, Switzerland.
The objective of the session, as mandated by COP 20, was to develop the negotiating text based on the elements for a draft negotiating text annexed to Decision 1/CP.20 (Lima Call for Climate Action).
The GNT adopted at ADP 2-8 serves as the basis for the negotiations of the 2015 agreement.
